conbody.p: This document provides an overview of the Video HAI (Hardware Adaptation Interface) component.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The Video HAI component provides a hardware abstraction layer for video playing and recording.

section.title: Required Background
section.p: The Hardware Adaptation Interfaces Overview provides an introduction to the Video HAI and related components.

section.title: Architectural Relationships
section.p: The Video HAI component interacts with the following components:

li.p: The MMF loads the appropriate video controller plug-ins, and then those video controller plug-ins use the framework to access the HAI.
The MDF provides the codec interface for video codecs.

section.title: API Summary
section.p: The Video HAI component includes the following APIs:

entry.p: Library providing video decoding and encoding hardware acceleration.
For more information, see DevVideo Overview.
